content: around 36 slip_stitch to join round 4 2dc in first st double_crochet in next 2 sts *2dc in next st double_crochet in next 2 sts* repeat * * around 48 slip_stitch to join do not fasten_off instead continue using the working yarn on the hook to join the panel to the bag stuff sack - joining panels line up the right side of the second panel with the bottom of the bag the second panel should be facing you pattern continued join the pieces with a slip_stitch in the space where a diamond starts on the bag bottom slip_stitch in each st around until there are 2 diamonds unworked fo and weave in ends this will leave a gap that will be used to stuff the bag into the integrated sack want a carrying loop instead of fastening off after joining the panels chain a number of stitches that will leave the desired length of loop try 10 and adjust from there slip_stitch into the start of the panel join on the other side then fo and weave in ends this should leave a carrying loop at the top of the second panel that is easy to clip onto a key ring or carabiner for easy transport and access or see below for an optional leaf loop instead fruit modifications optional - leaf carrying loop with green yarn ch6 single_crochet in second chain from hook half_double_crochet in next chain double_crochet in next chain half_double_crochet in next chain single_crochet in last chain slip_stitch to an unworked st on the second panel of the bag ch10 sl st into the same space to create a loop fo and weave in ends or for a second leaf ch6 single_crochet in second chain from hook half_double_crochet in next chain double_crochet in next chain half_double_crochet in next chain single_crochet in last chain fo the the ends together to secure the leaves and weave in ends pattern continued interested in bright bold fruit colored bags try the following color suggestions to create a medley of fresh fruit themes that are perfect for all your shopping needs citrus bright orange or yellow base bag with green leaf loop blueberry dark blue/purple base bag with green leaf loop cherry bright or dark red base bag with green leaf loop watermelon dark green base bag work second panel as follows first 2 rounds in bright pink or red round 3 in white round 4 in same color as base bag kiwi dark green or dark tan base bag work second panel as follows first round in ivory or other light color rounds 2 and 3 in light green round 4 in same color as base bag apple dark red/gold/bright green base bag work second panel as follows first 3 rounds in ivory or other light color round 4 in same color as base bag with green leaf loop
